title: annAmayA nIku shASTAnga
sahitya:
annAmayA nIku sASTAnga vandanamannA annAmayA O annammayyA


anupallavi

  vinnAmayA nIdu vividha sankIrtanamlennO vini nija pada kavitA pitAmahu


caraNam 1    kannAmayA mahimalennO nI lOkani nIdu bOdhanalannI telusu
    caraNam 2    punnAmayA tanala pOgoTTu varamivvamannA muraLI rava rUpa nI sATilE
